contentList.content: A natural spellcaster, you seek to augment your burgeoning power with study in both the arcane and mundane.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> increases by [1], your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">jump</LSTag> distance increases by [2], and your carrying capacity is increased by a half.
When you make a melee or spell attack, add half of your Battlemage level to the damage it deals.
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to the damage it deals.
Add your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag> to all ability and skill checks.
